commands.name: search-pypi
commands.title: Search Python PyPi Packages
commands.description: Search for Python packages on PyPi

commands.name: python-interpretor
commands.title: Launch Python Interpretor
commands.description: Launches the globally available python Interpreter

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
